sentences.sentence: Her brothers were both hefty men in their forties.
sentences.translation: 她的两个兄弟都是四十多岁，身高体壮。

sentences.sentence: Steel cans were introduced sometime during the forties.
sentences.translation: 钢罐是在四十年代的某个时候开始使用的。

sentences.sentence: He didn't get married until he was well into his forties.
